title_localized.en: Can I store my luggage if I arrive before my check-in time or check out early?

faq_content_localized.en:
You may store your luggage at the front desk if you arrive before the 3:00PM check-in time. Leave your bags with Apple Core Hotels and go explore the neighborhood for a few hours before you check-in.

Likewise, the staff can hold the luggage at the 12:00PM noon check-out for the rest of the afternoon.

Please note that overnight luggage storage is not available at any of our hotels.
